title: BMMJ03
description: Machine Homing Not Done after machine power supply turned on.
reasons_remedies: The homing machine process is not performed.
On the Home screen, tap the Machine Homing key to move all machine units to their original position.
text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMMJ03
Error Code 03
Category: BMMJ
Title: BMMJ03
Alarm Message: Homing Not Done
Description: Machine Homing Not Done after machine power supply turned on.
Reason & Remedy:
1. The homing machine process is not performed.
2. On the Home screen, tap the Machine Homing key to move all machine units to their original position.
Visual References:
- Home Screen
